headline: 3 Reasons to Sell RVTY and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Revvity’s stock price fell to $90.78. Shareholders have lost 18.8% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 5.2%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
